author: Michael R. Gordon
title: Trump, by Firing Head Diplomat, Recasts U.S. Foreign Policy
text:
WASHINGTON—The shake-up at the Trump administration’s State Department is unfolding at a critical juncture for two pressing nuclear issues and signals a hard-line shift in U.S. foreign policy.
Central Intelligence Agency Director Mike Pompeo is strikingly different in his professional background and views from Secretary of State Rex Tillerson, who he was named to replace after President Donald Trump fired Mr. Tillerson on Tuesday.
...
